pullRequest.title: Archive openj9-docs if ARCHIVE_JAVADOC is set

nodes.bodyText: As I had another look at this today, I noticed that this message is missing the closing single quote just like line 384: could you fix both, please?

commit.message:
Archive openj9-docs if ARCHIVE_JAVADOC is set

Signed-off-by: Simon Rushton <rushton@uk.ibm.com>

beforeCommit.message:
Change CRLF to LF

Signed-off-by: Simon Rushton <rushton@uk.ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Archive openj9-docs if ARCHIVE_JAVADOC is set

Signed-off-by: Simon Rushton <rushton@uk.ibm.com>
